Lisa Marie Crafts

The Gallery of Beautiful Gifts

See below for a selection of our lovingly crafted collection, ranging from greeting cards to home decorations

An old book upcycled into a decorative birdcage, making a perfect mantelpiece for the home

A love heart hanging decoration created from an old puzzle hand-painted purple

A delicate Husband & Wife bauble made to celebrate the couple's first Christmas together

A turquoise Christmas snowflake and angel hanging decoration assembled from a selection of beads

A specially designed Good Luck card to wish the recipient all the best in their future adventures

A charming Birthday card crafted to put a big smile on the birthday girl's face

An adorable Graduation card to celebrate and congratulate the graduate for reaching the end of an educational chapter

A cutesy Christmas card to bring warmth and joy over the festive season

A novelty gift frame for a friend and fellow Frozen fan, sweet enough to melt any frozen heart

A cheeky pyrography frame to mark the beginning of a loved one's retirement life

A dainty origami bunny holding chocolate eggs to deliver Easter delight to friends and family

A collection of miniature socks lovingly crocheted to bear Christmas treats for a special group of friends

If you need more inspiration and want to view our full collection, take a look at our Instagram
